msg: New runmode "syncslave" for oak-run to start a standalone FailoverClient.

author: baedke
msg: Bug fixed: master startup occasionally deadlocked due to race conditions.
Features added: MBean support, compression, checksums, master access restriction by ip address, client can be started via oak-run runmode.
